up: CREATE TABLE users(address_line VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Address Line', cell VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Cell', create_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Create Time', delete_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Date and Time record was deleted', login_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Date and Time user logged in', email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE COMMENT 'Email', goa_member_signup BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'GOA Memeber Signup', goa_member_number VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'GOA Member Number', id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Primary Key', pswrd_hash VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Password Hashed', pswrd_salt VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Password Salt', touched_by VARCHAR(36) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'User that touched the record last', update_time DATETIME DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Update Time', user_role TINYINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 4 COMMENT 'User Role', user_status TINYINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 1 COMMENT 'User Status', username VARCHAR(255) COMMENT 'Username') COMMENT 'user details';
